revised_title: Intensity Distribution in Helium Band Spectrum at 4650 Å
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to study the intensity distribution in the band spectrum of helium at 4650 Å. They used various methods to measure the densities of the photographic plates and found that the intensity distribution followed a smooth curve. The results provided insights into the distribution of intensities among the lines of a band, which was essential for understanding the behavior of molecules and atoms.
